attributes.action: Make credit companies do more thorough security checks to help stop fraud
attributes.additional_details: I was recently a victim of identity theft where someone managed to take credit out in my name after learning my basic personal details from hacking my phone
attributes.background: Enforce stricter security guidelines to help prevent identity theft and fraudulent activity

rejection.details: The Financial Conduct Authority regulate financial services firms and financial markets in the UK, you can find more information here: https://www.fca.org.uk/
